title: [Large-Scale] Short-Term Course on Facebook-Based Teacher Training and Social Studies Material Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital platform utilization skills and experience in social studies education
context.additional_context: Enhances social studies material design competencies for in-service teachers in a blended learning environment utilizing Facebook group features.

learning_goals: Learners can collaborate with peer teachers using a Facebook virtual platform to design one type of digital resource for social studies.
Learners can derive three improvement strategies for instructional design from peers and instructors through online discussions and feedback features.
Learners can produce and share a 10-minute social studies video resource on a blended learning platform.

resources: Social studies curriculum standards for teachers

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
